title: Perry's Victory & International Peace Memorial: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather          The Boy Scout motto "Be Prepared!" applies to a visit to one of your national parks and Perryâ€™s Victory is no exception. Good planning and preparation will make your visit enjoyable and rewarding. Summer months can be extremely hot and humid, with occasional and sudden severe thunderstorms.  Fall and spring are pleasant with cool temperatures and brisk winds.  During the Winter the Memorial and Visitor Center are closed.  For the most current weather forecast visit these sites:  National Weather Service The Weather Channel The Weather Underground  If boating on the Lake be aware that because of Lake Erie's Western Basin is shallow and storms can pick up quickly.  If you have traveled to the island by ferry you will want to check their websites, Facebook or Twitter for changes in schedule due to weather. Miller Boat Line Jet-Express If you want to see current satellite images of the lake you will want to visit the NOAA CoastWatch page.
